title: **4 Weeks Free!** Stunning Downtown Denver 1 Bedroom! 5 min DIA!
neighborhood: Central Park * City Park * Park Hill * Aurora * Downtown
posting_body: ['**SPECIAL** 4 WEEKS FREE!!', '~~~', 'New ProRated Rent = $1586 Monthly / 13 Months.', 'Originally $1710 /month', 'Call or Text Patrick to set up your for Fast Personal Showings or Virtual Showings', 'Everything you need for balanced living, with both apartment home and community-wide amenities designed to enhance your sense of well-being as well as your desire to connect with others.', '* \t\tMinimum 9′ ceilings', '* \t\tVinyl plank flooring', '* \t\tKitchens feature stainless steel appliances', '* \t\tSide-by-side refrigerators with water dispenser in door', '* \t\tGranite countertops with tile backsplashes', '* \t\tContemporary cabinetry', '* \t\tWasher/dryer in every unit', '* \t\tCombination bath/showers*', '* \t\tPrivate Balconies*', '* \t\tCoworking lounge with private offices, quiet conversation rooms, conference rooms, coffee service and printer', '* \t\tPool courtyard with infinity edge, resort-style pool including tanning ledge, hot tub and pool bar;', '* \t\tRooftop deck with both indoor lounge featuring kitchen, fireplaces and a kegerator;', '* \t\tFitness center with cardio and strength equipment and a movement studio featuring both yoga and spin cycles', '* \t\tPet spa', 'Call or Text Patrick to set up your for Fast Personal Showings or Virtual Showings', '*Restrictions Apply.', 'Pricing, availability and lease terms subject to change anytime!']
